PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpatialGeoObsBorehole
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for geoscience observations in boreholes.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholeElevation
PropertyDef.Definition: If present, the property reports the elevation data in meters for the borehole (i.e., wellbore) start point. This is a compromise approach to allow for delivery of legacy 2D data without elevation data, and for software that cannot process a 3D GM_Point.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholeInclination
PropertyDef.Definition: The angle formed by a vertical line and the vertical component in the borehole direction is entered.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholeAzimuth
PropertyDef.Definition: If the drilling is inclined, the horizontal component in the borehole direction is entered based on the 360 degree orientation method moving right from true north.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholePurpose
PropertyDef.Definition: The purpose property reports the purpose for which the borehole was drilled.

PropertyDef.Name: Operator
PropertyDef.Definition: The organisation or agency responsible for commissioning the borehole (as opposed to the agency which drilled the borehole).

PropertyDef.Name: DrillingContractor
PropertyDef.Definition: The property DrillingContractor reports the organisation responsible for drilling the borehole (as opposed to commissioning the borehole).

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholeLengthPlanned
PropertyDef.Definition: The planned length of a borehole e.g. in a site investigation program, in metres, as determined by the data provider.

PropertyDef.Name: BoreholeLengthDrilled
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of a borehole as drilled and logged, in metres, as determined by the data provider.

PropertyDef.Name: DrillingMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of drilling methods used to perform the investigation.
